price: 8. Kaadu jinni: diggah nanu qaran gufnam fanneeh, gibdi malaykay kaa dacrissaa kee dabiitittek kibbiimeh neh suge iyye.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lamasnā al-samāa fawajadnāhā muli-at ḥarasan shadīdan washuhuban
